QueryDefinition.Query: select ch.person_id as PersonId, pr.provid provid, p.rxdate, p.num_refills, cast(p.days_supply as int) as days_supply, p.route, p.quantity_of_dose, p.quantity_per_fill, isnull(p.strength, '') + ';' + isnull(p.strength_unit, '') + ';' + isnull(p.dosage_form, '') + ';' + isnull(p.dose_frequency, '') as dose_unit_source_value, p.ndc, SUBSTRING(p.ndc,1,9) ndc_9, 1 as itNdc from {sc}.prescriptions_written as p JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE left join {sc}.provider pr on p.provid = pr.provid where ndc is not NULL order by 1
